snippet: In his first appearance with the Royal Ballet, Mr. Gomes will dance the role of Oberon in Frederick Ashton's "The Dream" opposite Alina Cojocaru.
abstract: In his first appearance with the Royal Ballet, Mr. Gomes will dance the role of Oberon in Frederick Ashton's "The Dream" opposite Alina Cojocaru.

headline.main: Marcelo Gomes to Appear With the Royal Ballet
